page.title:
Consistent? (Cont.) • Is it unfair to treat students differently? Nope! It is unprofessional to treat all students the same; they are indeed individuals. Discuss this with the classroom teacher.
Consistent? (Cont.)
• Is it unfair to treat students differently?
Nope! It is unprofessional to treat all
students the same; they are indeed
individuals. Discuss this with the
classroom teacher.
page.enlisting:
• Remind students in the overview that
• Remind students in the overview that they are all individuals with special skills and talents. Sometimes, different methods are needed to respond to different needs.
they are all individuals with special skills
and talents. Sometimes, different
methods are needed to respond to
different needs.

page.title:
Consistent? (Cont.)
Consistent? (Cont.)
page.enlisting:
• Appropriate consequences must be provided for each person if optimal results are to be achieved. In advance, discuss these with the teacher. • Appropriate reinforces must be used as well. All students don’t respond equally to the same kind of praise. • Beware of contrived reinforcers. • Appropriate consequences must be provided for each person if optimal results are to be achieved.
